thread.title: From Ethiopian orphanage to Heart of Illinois soccer fields
thread.title_full: From Ethiopian orphanage to Heart of Illinois soccer fields

title: From Ethiopian orphanage to Heart of Illinois soccer fields
text:
From Ethiopian orphanage to Heart of Illinois soccer fields 
By WEEK Reporter October 14, 2015 Updated Oct 14, 2015 at 9:17 PM CDT 
Three years ago, Josef Halcomb and Bereket Leman were playing soccer at an orphanage in Ethiopia. Monday, Halcomb was starring for Normal Community and Leman was starring for Morton. Here's their amazing story of love, adoption and soccer.
